items.sentence: How many times did you go to church last year?
I suspect that Tom won\'t be doing that today.
I suspected that Tom wouldn\'t be able to win.
I can\'t believe you did all this by yourself.
I can\'t figure out how to get this door open.
Do you know where your children are right now?
Do you think Tom was really telling the truth?
Tom picked up his pencil and started to write.
I can understand why you might not want to go.
You\'re not fooling anybody, except maybe Tom.
